data.content:
noun
plural -tails
[count] :a long piece of cloth that hangs down at the back of a man's formal coat - usually plural
He caught his coattails in the door.
coattails [plural] :the help or influence of another person's work, ideas, or popularity
They were elected to Congress by riding (on) the coattails of the President. = They were swept into office on the coattails of the President. [=they were elected because they belong to the same political party as the President, who is very popular]
